entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
